code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import HeroCarousel from'../components/HeroCarousel';import'./Blog.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Blog=()=>{const blogPosts=[{id:1,title:'Top 10 Adventure Destinations for 2025',date:'22/8/2025',image:'/assets/vehicles/polaris-rzr1000.jpg',excerpt:'Discover the most exciting adventure destinations to visit this year...'},{id:2,title:'Essential Tips for Desert Adventures',date:'15/7/2025',image:'/assets/vehicles/dirt-bike.jpg',excerpt:'Everything you need to know before embarking on your desert journey...'},{id:3,title:'Best Time to Visit Desert Locations',date:'10/6/2025',image:'/assets/vehicles/canam-maverick-turbo.jpg',excerpt:'Learn about the optimal seasons for desert adventures...'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HeroCarousel,{title:"Blog",subtitle:"Home \u2192 Blog"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-intro",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"section-label",children:"Latest News"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Our Blog & Articles"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Stay updated with the latest adventure tips, destination guides, and travel stories."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-grid",children:blogPosts.map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"blog-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-image",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:post.image,alt:post.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-date",children:post.date})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:post.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:post.excerpt}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"#",className:"read-more",children:"Read More \u2192"})]})]},post.id))})]})})]});};export default Blog;
